author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Sidney Crosby Just Scored The Most Ridiculous Hockey Goal Of All Time With One Hand
text:
Sidney Crosby is not a human. That is all.
Sidney Crosby ladies and gents. pic.twitter.com/JkvwvSo3TG 
— Aivis Kalniņš (@A_Kalnins) March 21, 2017
